pr_title: Epoll patch and HTTP2 frame size tune.

timeline.message:
Epoll patch and HTTP2 frame size tune

Inlcuded epoll in gradle build.
Add config for http2FrameMaxSize, http2initialWindowSize and WriteBufferWaterMark to support larger frame size.

timeline.bodyText: Do we want to have both the log messages in Http2FrameLogger and this handler? They can potentially be redundant, but I do see that this class also logs ambry request info, which could be useful.
timeline.author: cgtz

replies.bodyText: It's easy to enable this debug level with your script, but I guess it doesn't work to Netty?
replies.author: zzmao

replies.bodyText: It works with netty too. I guess since these are separate classes they can be turned on/off independently and both may help with debugging
replies.author: cgtz

timeline.bodyText: I would suggest just passing requestInfo and not requestInfo.toString() into this logger calls. It will avoid the string concatenation when debug logging is not enabled and makes the method calls a bit less verbose.
